nodes.text: The Foundry was a chromium mining site on Burnin Konn. Reportedly built on the richest vein of ore on the planet, it had fallen out of sight or into disuse by the time of the Iron Blockade. However, several months into the lock down, the Uprising learned of the site's existence, and sought to secure it before anyone else, in hopes of obtaining the funds necessary to establish an open, armed rebellion against the Galactic Empire.
